## StabilityDepositChange type

Represents the change between two Stability Deposit states.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type StabilityDepositChange<T> = {
    depositDebtToken: T;
    withdrawDebtToken?: undefined;
} | {
    depositDebtToken?: undefined;
    withdrawDebtToken: T;
    withdrawAllDebtToken: boolean;
};
```
